Crown of the Frost King

crown (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 427
armor id [armor]: 212 (Magic Crown)
protection, head [prothead]: 9
resist cold [coldres]: +25
leadership (magic) [ldr-m]: +25
batstartsum2 [batstartsum2]: #833 Ice Elemental x 2
coldaura [coldaura]: 25
(unremovable [cursed], crown [crown])

Requires 25W to forge (W4)

This crown has an ancient, powerful frost being trapped in its diamonds. Anyone putting on the crown will soon become influenced by the elemental being and claim the crown as his forever. The wearer of the crown will radiate severe cold and will also be protected by two ice elementals whenever he is threatened.
